text: In the Alleys of Love (, Dar Koocheha-ye Eshgh) is a 1991 Iranian war movie directed by Khosrow Sinai and starring Mehdi Ahmadi, Yousef Jokar, Bahram Zandi, Levon Haftvan, Hamid Farokhnezhad, Mohammad Ebrahim Jafari. == Other websites == * Category:1991 movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Iranian movies Category:Movies directed by Khosrow Sinai
title: In the Alleys of Love
